Considered the oldest family name in Chicago pizza, Jino Biancalana's is as rich in history as its pizza is in flavor.

item.title: Our Menu
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" allow_overflow="yes" css=".vc_custom_1557068799167{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 110px !important;padding-bottom: 110px !important;background-color: #fafafa !important;}"][vc_column][vc_single_image image="2422" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1557068783502{margin-top: -245px !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_custom_heading text="Legendary Deep Dish" font_container="tag:h3|text_align:center" use_theme_fonts="yes" special_font="true" css=".vc_custom_1557059891229{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Chicago-style deep dish pizza is the heartiest of the pizza varieties and typically eaten with a knife and fork. The dough is patted out by hand and raised up high on the sides of a seasoned deep dish pizza pan. True Chicago-style pizza crust is actually rather thin but sturdy enough to hold the delicious toppings.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner gap="35" css=".vc_custom_1557060456259{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 6% !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 6% !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][lafka_foodmenu hide_foodmenu_images="yes" foodmenu_simple_menu="yes" limit="4" offset="8" taxonomies="22"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][lafka_foodmenu hide_foodmenu_images="yes" foodmenu_simple_menu="yes" limit="4" offset="12" taxonomies="22"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" allow_overflow="yes" css=".vc_custom_1557070208862{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 110px !important;padding-bottom: 110px !important;background-color: #222222 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_single_image image="2425" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1557069034927{margin-top: -245px !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_custom_heading text="Thin Crust Pizza" font_container="tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff" use_theme_fonts="yes" special_font="true" css=".vc_custom_1557060948280{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

A return to the ancient tradition of Neapolitan Pizza revisited thanks to a menu that recalls ingredients and regional recipes of a good, beautiful and genuine Italy with high quality raw materials.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner gap="35" css=".vc_custom_1557060463602{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][lafka_foodmenu color_scheme="lafka-foodmenu-light" hide_foodmenu_images="yes" foodmenu_simple_menu="yes" limit="4" offset="7" taxonomies="22"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][lafka_foodmenu color_scheme="lafka-foodmenu-light" hide_foodmenu_images="yes" foodmenu_simple_menu="yes" limit="4" offset="4" taxonomies="22"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" allow_overflow="yes" css=".vc_custom_1557069173824{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 110px !important;padding-bottom: 110px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][vc_single_image image="2428" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1557069194119{margin-top: -245px !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_custom_heading text="Stuffed Crust Pizza" font_container="tag:h3|text_align:center" use_theme_fonts="yes" special_font="true"][vc_column_text]

Chicago-style deep dish pizza is the heartiest of the pizza varieties and typically eaten with a knife and fork. The dough is patted out by hand and raised up high on the sides of a seasoned deep dish pizza pan. True Chicago-style pizza actually has a rather thin crust that compliments the delicious toppings.

So We Took The Challenge...

Leberkas sirloin spare ribs beef kevin. Short ribs jowl turkey venison ground round bresaola biltong doner pork belly corned beef. Beef ribs short loin pastrami tail filet mignon. - Gordon Ramsey

Ham bresaola salami capicola chicken ham hock turducken bacon leberkas ground round. Tri-tip sausage ribeye flank, picanha pork.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1555329445620{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"]

The End Result Was Absolutely Amazing

Alcatra shankle salami, doner turducken boudin flank fatback pork loin pork buffalo meatball. Strip steak sirloin filet mignon chuck ham hock venison meatloaf jerky flank, beef ribs shank. Short loin ham meatball sausage pork belly. Tongue jowl bacon spare ribs pork loin shoulder sirloin chuck buffalo. Kevin salami meatloaf prosciutto pork loin boudin sausage pork. Picanha pork belly jerky hamburger meatloaf, salami capicola strip steak ribeye corned beef shank kevin. wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Using a custom CNC machine and large PVC sewage pipes, the designer created a range of minimalist chairs for modern spaces. The natural curvature of the pipes provides a comfortable solution for the backrest, while the plywood legs offer perfect support.

The mass-produced pipes are not only durable and designed to last for decades but they’re also accessible and versatile. Environmentally conscious and ingenious, the Pipeline Project aims to explore the potential of sustainable manufacturing.

As the face rotates and the perforated dots reveal the hour indicated by an alignment with the frame, the wearer is able to conceive time as a series of ordered dots, multiplying as the day progresses, and allowing a new perception of time.

A natural choice for those who appreciate slow living just as much as they love minimalism. More importantly, it will become a crucial component to all those moments of relaxation or reflection, accompanied by a cup of hot tea and good conversation.
